Detailed Description

Socket for receiving Packets over tcp.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum PacketReceiveSocket::read_state_t
 

The current state.

Enumeration values:
reading_size  Reading the packet size (4 bytes).
reading_packet  Reading the packet data.
done  Done.
error  Error.
